get.title: Get Device Referral
get.subtitle: Please verify your region, as the Device Referrals are region-locked, so if you choose the wrong one you will not receive the credit. On accepting a Device Referral, you must buy the Meta Quest 2 before 30 days pass, and both you and the Advocate will receive 30€/$30/£23 in credit to use in the Oculus Store.

give.title: Give Device Referral
give.subtitle: Please verify your region, as the Device Referrals are region-locked, so if you choose the wrong one you will not receive the credit. Once a Friend accepts your Device Referral, and they buy the Meta Quest 2 before 30 days pass, both you and the Friend will receive 30€/$30/£23 in credit to use in the Oculus Store. You can verify that the link is valid before adding it to the queue by clicking on the button below.

get.error_notfound: A Device Referral was not found for your region. Please try again later.

give.success: Your Device Referral has been added to the verification queue.
give.error_conflict: A Device Referral with your Advocate id already exists in the system.
give.error_unprocessable: Your Device Referral link is invalid. Please review it.
